column5: Spent some time fishing southern Georgian Bay last week with my bro and some buddies. We typically target Bass and Pike but catch the odd Musky accidentally. We had a blast fishing and tubing with some late night bevy's mixed in.
Nice. Fishing with boys, tubing, meat and cold beer. Recipe for fun.
Looks like fun was had.  And congrats on the ski!
Nice to see men with facial hair.............  Doug
Nice to see men with facial hair.............  Doug  Doesn't turn me on, but different strokes for different folks I guess!
Back to SirCranksaLot...........  Look at my avatar, that's me...........  Facial hair is a GOOD thing!
That's real? I wasn't sure what with Photoshop and all. I bet you'd have a lot of fun at the Ont Sci Center with their Van der Graaf generator!!!
Good fishing fellas! Aka shag that beard is seriously respectable! 10/10

Yes that is my real hair and at that time my beard was about half-way down my chest, with several beard hairs touching my belly button.  The photo was a "special effects"  picture that showed all of the hair as standing out from my head.  Here I am with a three month beard.     I get it trimmed right down when I get my hair cut at Easter and Christmas............  And so yes I think it is a very proper thing that men have facial hair.  And how about that fishing trip, eh!!!!
